attributes.comment:
We are in the middle of an adoption. The expiration date for the current fingerprints and USCIS
required for this adoption are so short at the present time, that we will need to redo them before we
can even go to get our child. Raising the rates will put an additional burden on all of the families
who are trying to adopt children from other countries. This seems a bit excessive when our
representatives will not increase the expiration date on this particular portion of the adoption
process. Please do not increase the fees knowing that all of the families involved in this process
will need to do this a second time.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by M.E.G
